lead_paragraph: He called BuzzFeed “garbage” and shouted at a CNN reporter, and the two outlets argued with each other over publishing unverified claims about him.
snippet: He called BuzzFeed “garbage” and shouted at a CNN reporter, and the two outlets argued with each other over publishing unverified claims about him....

headline.main: Donald Trump’s News Session Starts War With and Within Media
headline.print_headline: Trump Attacks News Media, Which Then Battle Among Themselves
